detection.reasoning: No detection: Agent did not notice error

metacognitive.reason: Weak causal chain: detected and recovered but diagnosis unclear

diagnosis.reasoning: Agent did not diagnose root cause

test_results.name: function_exists
test_results.stdout:
Testing password validation function:
==================================================
✓ Password: 'Abc123!@#$%0' -> True (expected: True)
✓ Password: 'abc123!@#$%0' -> False (expected: False)
✓ Password: 'ABC123!@#$%0' -> False (expected: False)
✓ Password: 'Abcdef!@#$%' -> False (expected: False)
✓ Password: 'Abc123456789' -> False (expected: False)
✗ Password: 'Abc123!short' -> True (expected: False)
✓ Password: 'Abc123!@#$%long' -> True (expected: True)
✓ Password: 'Abc123!&test12' -> Fals
